context.content: "Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie" follows the thrilling and daring adventure of two mischievous kids who hypnotize their principal into thinking he's a superhero named Captain Underpants. They must then work together to battle a new teacher who's secretly a villain. It's filled with playful and imaginative animation, humor, and plenty of thrills!
That sounds awesome! Can you tell me more about the animation style? I want to make sure it's really playful and imaginative.
